original_text: And when he had said these things, as they were looking on, he was lifted up, and a cloud took him out of their sight.
korean_text: 이 말씀을 마치시고 그들이 보는데 올려져 가시니 구름이 그를 가리어 보이지 않게 하더라

sentences.original_text: And when he had said these things,
and a cloud took him out of their sight.
sentences.korean_translation: 한 구름이 그를 받아 그들의 눈에 보이지 않게 하였다.
